<root><template><title>Command

</title><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>version</name>=<value> 1.42 <comment><!-- MAYBE 1.40 (or earlier) - see https://feedback.bistudio.com/T81738 --></comment> </value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets the cell picture's colour. </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[lnbSetPictureColor]] [idc, [row, column], colour] </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc) </value></part><part><name>Parameter 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc) </value></part><part><name>Parameter 3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> colour: [[Color|Color (RGBA)]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 4</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[lnbSetPictureColor]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[row, column], colour] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc) </value></part><part><name>Parameter 22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - 0-based index (first column is 0, second is 1, etc) </value></part><part><name>Parameter 23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> colour: [[Color|Color (RGBA)]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 24</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbSetPictureColor]] [1492, [1,0], [0,0.75,0.3,0.5]];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>ctrl [[lnbSetPictureColor]] [[0, 3], [1,0,0,1]];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>
